Prime Minister Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP)
column6: Loan subsidy for new businesses in rural/urban areas. Best for small factories.

description: PM Vishwakarma Yojana
column6: Collateral-free loan for 18 traditional trades like carpenters, tailors, and blacksmiths.

description: MUDRA Loan (Tarun)
column6: Funding for expansion of existing business units. No collateral required.

description: Stand-Up India Scheme
column6: Bank loan for Greenfield projects set up by SC/ST or Women borrowers.

column6: Financial incentives for manufacturing MMF fabrics and technical textiles.

description: Technology Upgradation Fund Scheme (ATUFS)

description: PM Kisan Sampada Yojana
column6: For setting up Mega Food Parks, Cold Chains, and Agro-processing clusters.

column6: Collateral-free credit for Micro and Small Enterprises.

column6: Subsidy for buying Electric Vehicles (2W/3W/4W) for commercial use.

description: Start-up India Seed Fund
column6: Financial assistance to startups for proof of concept, prototype development.

description: National Livestock Mission
column6: Subsidy for Goat, Sheep, Poultry, and Piggery farming infrastructure.

description: Ayushman Bharat Hospital Fund
column6: Financing for setting up hospitals in Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities.

column6: One-time small savings scheme for women and girls.
